docs.name: OVERVIEW
docs.content:
# @ngx-kit/ui-base overview

Set of Angular components based on ngx-kit and packed into Angular-cli schematics.

All 3rd-party ui-kit has their own limitations and overheads. But projects has own business and design goals, and often the best way to reach this goals - craft a component from scratch.

The best interface for ui-components is possibility to change the source code.

Ui-base is set of prepared and simplified components. Just generate code by Angular-cli to your project or kit and modify it if needed.


## Usage

Works only with Angular-cli.

Install latest Angular-cli, ngx-kit core and ui-base schematics: 

```
npm install @angular/cli@next @angular-devkit/core @angular-devkit/schematics -g
npm install @ngx-kit/ngx-kit @ngx-kit/styler --save
npm install @ngx-kit/ui-base --save-dev
```

Import ngx-kit to the root module:

```typescript
@NgModule({
  ...
  imports: [
    ...
    KitFullForRootModule,
```
 
Generate code:

```
ng g ui-button -c=@ngx-kit/ui-base [name]
```

Don't forget to import generated module to module where you need it.  


## Links

* [github](https://github.com/ngx-kit/ui-base)

doc.comment: Allow few panels open at a time.
Allow few panels open at a time.

code.content:
<ui-accordion [multiple]="true">
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 1</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 1 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 2</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 2 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 3</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 3 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
</ui-accordion>

<ui-accordion>
  <ui-accordion-panel *ngFor="let panel of panels">
    <ui-accordion-title>{{ panel.title }}</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      {{ panel.content }}
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
</ui-accordion>

<ui-accordion [activateFirst]="true">
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 1</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 1 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 2</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 2 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 3</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 3 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
</ui-accordion>

<ui-accordion>
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 1</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 1 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 2</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 2 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
  <ui-accordion-panel>
    <ui-accordion-title>Panel 3</ui-accordion-title>
    <ui-accordion-content *kitCollapse>
      Panel 3 content
    </ui-accordion-content>
  </ui-accordion-panel>
</ui-accordion>

code.content:
<ui-alert>
  <ui-alert-title>Message title</ui-alert-title>
  Message description
</ui-alert>
<ui-alert>Message text</ui-alert>

<ui-alert [color]="'default'">Default message text</ui-alert>
<ui-alert [color]="'primary'">Primary message text</ui-alert>

<ui-alert [closable]="true" [(isOpen)]="isOpen">Closable message text</ui-alert>
<button *ngIf="!isOpen" (click)="isOpen = true">Reopen</button>

doc.comment: If use corner position, do not forget to set relative position to parent.
If use corner position, do not forget to set relative position to parent.

<ui-badge [count]="150"></ui-badge>

<ui-badge [count]="1" [color]="'default'"></ui-badge>
<ui-badge [count]="2" [color]="'primary'"></ui-badge>

<button [uiButton] [size]="'s'">Size=s</button>
<button [uiButton] [size]="'m'">Size=m</button>
<button [uiButton] [size]="'l'">Size=l</button>

<ui-button-group [direction]="'column'">
  <button [uiButton]>Vert Grouped 1</button>
  <button [uiButton]>Vert Grouped 2</button>
  <button [uiButton]>Vert Grouped 3</button>
</ui-button-group>

<ui-button-group>
  <button [uiButton] [kitCheck] [(ngModel)]="buttonModel" [value]="1">Radio button 1</button>
  <button [uiButton] [kitCheck] [(ngModel)]="buttonModel" [value]="2">Radio button 2</button>
  <button [uiButton] [kitCheck] [(ngModel)]="buttonModel" [value]="3">Radio button 3</button>
</ui-button-group>

<ui-button-group>
  <button [uiButton]>Grouped 1</button>
  <button [uiButton]>Grouped 2</button>
  <button [uiButton]>Grouped 3</button>
</ui-button-group>

<ui-button-group>
  <button [uiButton] [kitCheck] [(ngModel)]="buttonModel1">Checkbox button 1</button>
  <button [uiButton] [kitCheck] [(ngModel)]="buttonModel2">Checkbox button 2</button>
  <button [uiButton] [kitCheck] [(ngModel)]="buttonModel3">Checkbox button 3</button>
</ui-button-group>
<button [uiButton]>Click!</button>

<button [uiButton] [color]="'default'">Default color</button>
<button [uiButton] [color]="'primary'">Primary color</button>

<ui-carousel>
  <ng-container *ngFor="let slide of slides">
    <ui-carousel-slide *kitSlide [style.background]="slide.color">{{ slide.content }}</ui-carousel-slide>
  </ng-container>
</ui-carousel>

<ui-carousel>
  <ui-carousel-slide *kitSlide [style.background]="'#F7A1A1'">Slide 1 Content</ui-carousel-slide>
  <ui-carousel-slide *kitSlide [style.background]="'#00D791'">Slide 2 Content</ui-carousel-slide>
  <ui-carousel-slide *kitSlide [style.background]="'#24B7EC'">Slide 3 Content</ui-carousel-slide>
</ui-carousel>
<ui-custom-select [(ngModel)]="model" [options]="options"></ui-custom-select>

demo.name: demo-date-picker-popup

code.content:
<input [(ngModel)]="model" [kitAnchor] aria-haspopup="true" #anchor="anchor">
<button (click)="opened = !opened">Toggle</button>

<ui-date-picker-popup *kitOverlay="opened"
                      [anchor]="anchor"
                      (outsideClick)="opened = false">
  <ui-date-picker [(ngModel)]="model"
                  (ngModelChange)="opened = false">
  </ui-date-picker>
</ui-date-picker-popup>

demo.readme:
In this demo we use `<ui-date-picker-popup>` for styling and `outsideClick` handling.

We don't incapsulate popup toggling and left it on your control. So you free to create your own component for this purposes.

code.content:
<ui-date-picker [(ngModel)]="model" [style.width.px]="300"></ui-date-picker>
{{ model | date }}

docs.content:
# UiNotification

Add `<ui-notification-host></ui-notification-host>` to the root component or any parent.

<ui-tabs>
  <ui-tabs-nav>
    <ui-tabs-tab *ngFor="let tab of tabs; let id = index" [id]="id">{{ tab.tab }}</ui-tabs-tab>
  </ui-tabs-nav>
  <ng-container *ngFor="let tab of tabs; let id = index">
    <ui-tabs-content *kitSlide="id">{{ tab.content }}</ui-tabs-content>
  </ng-container>
</ui-tabs>

  <ui-tabs-nav>
    <ui-tabs-tab [id]="1">Tab 1</ui-tabs-tab>
